name: My Dina Salon Doctor Kids Games (Girls & Boys)
name_original: My Dina Salon Doctor Kids Games (Girls & Boys)
description:
Can you help Dina look beautiful for their big day?

Play a super fun Kids Salon, Doctor, Dress Up, and Makeover Spa game today for Free!

Tons of levels & gameplay modes:
- Take grandma to the salon for a dress-up makeover!
- Play doctor and keep everyone healthy for the big trip!
- Hungry? Head to the ice cream parlor and have fun!
- And so many more fun levels and adventures!

Have fun playing My Dina Salon Doctor Kids Games (Girls & Boys)
